name: Yemi's Quest
description:
Yemi's Quest is a 2D/3D Minimalistic Retro Top-Down Shooter

You play as Yemi. Waking up in a strange dungeon with no clue on how they got there. Yemi's quest is to fight their way through monster infested area's. Collecting keys to get through each locked door, picking up coins for purchasing new weapons from a shop or just obtaining another life! Try to get Yemi back home! but if Yemi's lives get to zero, Game Over!

Features:

  • Two Modes to play! (Story Mode or Arena Mode)
  • 5+ areas to explore!
  • 7 Weapons that can be used!
  • 9 Bosses to defeat!
  • 30+ Monsters to slay!
  • 20+ Music Tracks to listen too while you play!
  • 1+ Hours of gameplay.
  • Permadeath.

Controls:

KeyboardMovementWASDThrowArrow KeysDashSpacebarInteractECamera RotationCPauseESC / P
  • Mouse is required for Menu and Pause Screens.

General Tips:

  • Destroy every portal you see to stop enemies from coming through during Story mode! (Portals can't be destroyed in Arena Mode!)
  • Hit every checkpoint you see even one's you hit previously! Yemi respawns on the last checkpoint hit!
  • Weapons switch on pick up! So if you like the weapon you have, watch out on picking up another!
  • Pick up every coin you see! Coin's let you purchase more lives and a chance at a better weapon at the shop.
Important!
  • Yemi's Quest does not save progress! If Game Over, you restart and wake up at the beginning! If you return to the menu, you wake up at the beginning when you start again! 
  • Yemi's Quest is 64-bit, 32-bit systems will not work! Sorry!

Other notes:

  • Please let me know of any bugs or issue's you may encounter with Yemi's Quest as I'll try to fix the issue you may encounter in a future update.
  • If you enjoy Yemi's Quest please consider writing  a comment of your experience  or anything regarding Yemi's Quest. Thank you for supporting or checking out Yemi's Quest!
